argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | crngbinom.s | |- S = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | crngbinom.m | |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | crngbinom.t | |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | crngbinom.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | crngbinom.g | |- G = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 6 |  | crngbinom.e | |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) |
| 7 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ringsrg | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. SRing ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. SRing ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ N e. NN0 ) -> R e. SRing ) |
| 11 | 5 | #P_crngmgp | |- ( R e. CRing -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ N e. NN0 ) -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ N e. NN0 ) -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 14 | 10, 12, 13 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_csrgbinom | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> ( N .^ ( A .+ B ) ) = ( R gsum ( k e. ( 0 ... N ) |-> ( ( N _C k ) .x. ( ( ( N - k ) .^ A ) .X. ( k .^ B ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> ( N .^ ( A .+ B ) ) = ( R gsum ( k e. ( 0 ... N ) |-> ( ( N _C k ) .x. ( ( ( N - k ) .^ A ) .X. ( k .^ B ) ) ) ) ) ) |
